items.prompt: An ________ is when you put money into something to make a profit.
items.explanation: Una inversión (investment) es poner dinero en algo para obtener beneficios.

items.prompt: Stocks are usually ________ than savings accounts.
items.explanation: Usamos el comparativo 'riskier' (más arriesgado) para comparar dos cosas.

items.prompt: If you buy ________, you own a small part of a company.
items.explanation: Las acciones (shares o stocks) representan una parte de la propiedad de una empresa.

items.prompt: The stock ________ is where people buy and sell shares.
items.explanation: El mercado de valores se llama 'stock market'.

items.prompt: A ________ is when you lose money on an investment.
items.explanation: Una pérdida (loss) ocurre cuando el valor de la inversión baja.

items.prompt: A bond is ________ (safe) than a stock.
items.explanation: El comparativo de 'safe' es 'safer' (más seguro).

items.prompt: Gold is ________ (expensive) than silver.
items.explanation: Para adjetivos largos como 'expensive', usamos 'more' para el comparativo.

items.prompt: Order the words: are / Bonds / than / safer / stocks
items.explanation: Estructura comparativa: Sujeto + are + adjetivo-er + than + objeto.

items.prompt: ROI stands for ________ on Investment.
items.explanation: ROI significa 'Return on Investment' (Retorno de la Inversión).

items.prompt: In finance, ________ is the possibility of losing money.
items.explanation: El riesgo (risk) es la probabilidad de pérdida.

items.prompt: The new investment is ________ (good) than the old one.
items.explanation: El comparativo irregular de 'good' es 'better'.

items.prompt: Real estate is often ________ than the stock market.
items.explanation: Para 'stable' solemos usar 'more stable' (más estable).

items.prompt: Order the words: than / riskier / Stocks / are / bonds
items.explanation: Las acciones son más arriesgadas que los bonos.

items.prompt: A ________ is the money you make after costs.
items.explanation: Un beneficio o ganancia es un 'profit'.

items.prompt: This year's profit is ________ (high) than last year's.
items.explanation: El comparativo de 'high' es 'higher' (más alto).

items.prompt: When you ________ money, you hope it grows over time.
items.explanation: Invertir (invest) es esperar que el dinero crezca.

items.prompt: Order the words: better / Profit / is / loss / than
items.explanation: La ganancia es mejor que la pérdida.

items.prompt: Diversifying means having ________ types of investments.
items.explanation: Diversificar significa tener diferentes (different) tipos de inversiones.

items.prompt: Is the stock market ________ (bad) than last month?
items.explanation: El comparativo irregular de 'bad' es 'worse' (peor).

items.prompt: High risk often means ________ potential profit.
items.explanation: A mayor riesgo, mayor (higher) beneficio potencial.

items.prompt: Order the words: higher / The / is / ROI / now
items.explanation: El retorno de la inversión es más alto ahora.

items.prompt: Savings are ________ (slow) than stocks to grow.
items.explanation: El comparativo de 'slow' es 'slower' (más lento).

items.prompt: People who invest are called ________.
items.explanation: Las personas que invierten son 'investors' (inversores).

items.prompt: Real estate is ________ (profitable) than many bonds.
items.explanation: Para adjetivos largos, usamos 'more' + adjetivo.

items.prompt: A ________ market is when stock prices are going down.
items.explanation: Un 'bear market' es cuando los precios de la bolsa bajan (mercado bajista).

items.prompt: A ________ market is when stock prices are going up.
items.explanation: Un 'bull market' es cuando los precios suben (mercado alcista).

items.prompt: This portfolio is ________ (diverse) than the other.
items.explanation: Usamos 'more' para comparar con el adjetivo 'diverse'.

items.prompt: Order the words: low / High / risk / is / than / better
items.sentence: Low risk is better than high risk
items.explanation: El bajo riesgo es mejor que el alto riesgo.

items.prompt: What is 'share' in the context of the stock market?
items.explanation: En finanzas, una 'share' es una acción de una empresa.

items.prompt: Is investing ________ (difficult) than saving?
items.explanation: Adjetivo largo: usamos 'more difficult' (más difícil).

items.prompt: To minimize risk, you should not put all your ________ in one basket.
items.explanation: Expresión común: 'Don't put all your eggs in one basket' (no te lo juegues todo a una carta).

items.prompt: New York's market is ________ (big) than Madrid's.
items.explanation: Adjetivo corto CVC: duplicamos la última consonante y añadimos -er.

items.prompt: Order the words: important / Risk / is / analysis / very
items.explanation: El análisis de riesgo es muy importante.

items.prompt: If an investment is ________, it gives you a lot of money back.
items.explanation: 'Profitable' significa que da beneficios o es rentable.

items.prompt: The interest rate is ________ (low) than yesterday.
items.explanation: El comparativo de 'low' es 'lower' (más bajo).

items.prompt: A ________ is a debt security where you lend money to an organization.
items.explanation: Un 'bond' (bono) es un título de deuda.

items.prompt: Order the words: than / more / gold / Silver / is / cheap
items.explanation: La plata es más barata que el oro.

items.prompt: This broker is ________ (fast) than the previous one.
items.explanation: El comparativo de 'fast' es 'faster' (más rápido).

items.prompt: What is 'loss' in Spanish?
items.explanation: 'Loss' significa pérdida en el contexto económico.

items.prompt: Investing for the long term is ________ (wise) than for the short term.
items.explanation: El comparativo de 'wise' (sabio/prudente) es 'wiser'.

items.prompt: We need to analyze the potential ________ of this project.
items.explanation: Necesitamos analizar el beneficio (profit) potencial.

items.prompt: Order the words: than / more / risky / stocks / Bonds / are / less
items.sentence: Bonds are less risky than stocks
items.explanation: Los bonos son menos arriesgados que las acciones.

items.prompt: Is the dollar ________ (strong) than the euro today?
items.explanation: El comparativo de 'strong' es 'stronger' (más fuerte).

items.prompt: The opposite of 'profit' is ________.
items.explanation: Lo opuesto a beneficio es pérdida (loss).

items.prompt: My new strategy is ________ (effective) than the old one.
items.explanation: Adjetivo largo: 'more effective' (más eficaz).

items.prompt: A ________ is a collection of investments.
items.explanation: Un 'portfolio' (cartera) es el conjunto de inversiones.

items.prompt: Order the words: check / You / should / ROI / the
items.explanation: Deberías comprobar el retorno de la inversión.

items.prompt: This option is ________ (cheap) than that one.
items.explanation: El comparativo de 'cheap' es 'cheaper'.

items.prompt: What is 'stock market' in Spanish?
items.explanation: 'Stock market' es la bolsa o mercado de valores.

items.prompt: Is technology ________ (interesting) than real estate?
items.explanation: Adjetivo largo: 'more interesting' (más interesante).

items.prompt: The ________ price changed dramatically today.
items.explanation: El precio de la acción (stock price) cambió hoy.

items.prompt: To get a high ________, you often need to take a risk.
items.explanation: Un alto retorno (return) suele requerir riesgo.

items.prompt: Inflation is ________ (high) this year than last year.
items.explanation: La inflación es más alta (higher) este año.

items.prompt: Cryptocurrencies are ________ (unstable) than gold.
items.explanation: Usamos 'more' para comparar con 'unstable'.

items.prompt: Order the words: diversify / You / should / portfolio / your
items.explanation: Deberías diversificar tu cartera.

items.prompt: A ________ is when a company pays part of its profit to shareholders.
items.explanation: Un 'dividend' (dividendo) es el reparto de beneficios.

items.prompt: You should check the ________ of your investment regularly.
items.explanation: Debes revisar el rendimiento (performance) de tu inversión.

items.prompt: This fund is ________ (popular) than the other one.
items.explanation: Adjetivo largo: 'more popular' (más popular).

items.prompt: The market is ________ (busy) in the morning than in the evening.
items.explanation: Adjetivo que termina en 'y': cambiamos 'y' por 'i' + er.

items.prompt: Order the words: long-term / is / Investing / a / strategy
items.explanation: Invertir es una estrategia a largo plazo.

items.prompt: What is 'dividend' in Spanish?
items.explanation: 'Dividend' significa dividendo en finanzas.

items.prompt: A ________ is a market participant who buys and sells for others.
items.explanation: Un 'broker' (corredor) opera por cuenta de otros.

items.prompt: Is gold ________ (useful) than cash?
items.explanation: Adjetivo largo: 'more useful' (más útil).

items.prompt: The risk is ________ (small) if you diversify.
items.explanation: El riesgo es más pequeño (smaller) si diversificas.

items.prompt: Order the words: your / money / Don't / lose
items.explanation: No pierdas tu dinero.

items.prompt: When the value ________, you make a profit.
items.explanation: Cuando el valor aumenta (increases), obtienes beneficio.

items.prompt: When the value ________, you have a loss.
items.explanation: Cuando el valor decrece (decreases), tienes una pérdida.

items.prompt: Online banking is ________ (convenient) than visiting the office.
items.explanation: Adjetivo largo: 'more convenient' (más conveniente).

items.prompt: Is the market ________ (active) today?
items.explanation: Aquí no se pide comparativo, solo el adjetivo.

items.prompt: Order the words: market / The / is / volatile / today
items.explanation: El mercado está volátil hoy.

items.prompt: A ________ investment is easy to convert into cash.
items.explanation: Una inversión 'liquid' (líquida) se convierte fácil en efectivo.

items.prompt: What is 'ROI' related to?
items.explanation: El ROI está relacionado con la rentabilidad (profitability).

items.prompt: Match the animal terms with their meanings:
items.explanation: Jerga común en los mercados financieros.

items.prompt: This report is ________ (accurate) than the last one.
items.explanation: Adjetivo largo: 'more accurate' (más preciso).

items.prompt: We need to set a long-term ________.
items.explanation: Necesitamos establecer una meta (goal) a largo plazo.
